@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create a new instance of an Icon cell renderer

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A blank image for use as a spacer in place of another image

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Retrieve the URI for a blank image

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{String}
   The URI of the blank image.
@return.description: The URI of the blank image.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Identify the image to be displayed in the cell.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
cellInfo {Map} Information about the cell being renderered, including:
  • state
  • rowDiv
  • stylesheet
  • element
  • dataIndex
  • cellData
  • height
@param.description:
Information about the cell being renderered, including:
  • state
  • rowDiv
  • stylesheet
  • element
  • dataIndex
  • cellData
  • height

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Map} The returned map should contain at least the url field, but may contain any others of these:
url
The URL of the image to be displayed
imageWidth
The width at which the image should be displayed
imageHeight
The height at which the image should be displayed
extras
Any extra attributes to be include in the 'image' tag.
@return.description:
The returned map should contain at least the url field, but may contain any others of these:
url
The URL of the image to be displayed
imageWidth
The width at which the image should be displayed
imageHeight
The height at which the image should be displayed
extras
Any extra attributes to be include in the 'image' tag.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Obtain the image data (url, tooltip) that's appropriate for this cell

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
cellInfo {Map} Information about the cell being renderered, including:
  • state
  • rowDiv
  • stylesheet
  • element
  • dataIndex
  • cellData
  • height
@param.description:
Information about the cell being renderered, including:

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
